When asked what SharePoint brings to the table that other Web development platforms don't, Steve Ballmer responded Well, you can do anything with anything. The question is, how much work is it? What we're trying to do is essentially give the people who build these sites a higher-level set of tools, so they're not reinventing the wheel. Can we provide infrastructure that ties in and lets the end user participate, and is done in a very high-quality, finished way for those folks? And we think the answer is yes.
